entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 27. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016
